Name: Ravaging Ghoul
Story Background: Once a fearsome warrior, now cursed to wander the night in search of fresh blood to sate its eternal hunger.
Ability: When Ravaging Ghoul enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life unless they sacrifice a creature.
Appearance Description: The Ravaging Ghoul is a hunched figure draped in tattered rags, its eyes glowing with a malevolent hunger as it shambles forward, claws outstretched.
